data.prayer: Lord, make the 111 believers in Govisümber to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 12,789 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Govisümber, Mongolia

data.prayer: Father, move the 111 believers in the state of Govisümber to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Govisümber who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Govisümber to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Darkhad people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, please help the 111 believers in the state of Govisümber to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Govisümber, Mongolia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 116 neighbors who are far from you in Govisümber. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Govisümber
location.people_groups_list: Dungan, Kalmyk-Oirat, Mongol, Khalka, Mongol, Khamnigan, Khoton
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dungan (6,100), Kalmyk-Oirat (261,000), Mongol, Khalka (2,297,000), Mongol, Khamnigan (600), Khoton (13,000)
